attributes.action: Increase the the direct funding for homeless charities.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The funding of housing and accomodation for the homeless in mainly funded by the Goverments Supporting People project which does go some way to help support projects but falls way short of supporting the continued development of housing and assistance for those who are homless or rough sleepers. The national rough sleepers estimate for 2007 published in September shows that there are just 498 rough sleepers in the UK, this figure how ever it is assesed is false as there are many thousands here in the UK and it is up to the Goverment to take responsibilty for real people who have real problems.
